article: Easily Add Venmo to Wallet: Debit Card or Apple Cash
intro: If you use Venmo often, you may be wondering if it's possible to connect your Venmo account to your Apple Wallet. While you cannot connect your

points.name: Adding Venmo Debit Card to Apple Wallet

steps.title: Wait for the card to be verified.
steps.subtitle: This should only take a few moments, and once it completes, your Venmo debit card will be added to Apple Wallet and can be used anywhere Apple Pay is accepted.
sub-points: Note that the Venmo debit card pulls from your Venmo balance, so you must have a Venmo balance to use the card.

points.name: Moving Money from Venmo to Apple Cash
